taskDescription: Drag the words into the correct boxes
resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
textField:
According to one source a good post-editor should have: 
The ability to identify *issues* in the raw MT output that need to be addressed and to *fix* them appropriately.
The ability to carry out the post-editing task with reasonable *speed*, so as to meet the expectations of daily *productivity* for this type of activity.
The ability to *adhere* to the guidelines, so as to minimise the number of ‘*preferential*’ changes, or changes that are not strictly speaking *necessary*, and which are normally outside the scope of PE.
